name: Audio Programming
description:
This is the project for my year 4 university Audio Programming module. It demonstrates a variety of different sound effects. Some notable features include:

  • Custom recorded foley
  • Audio effects such as reverb, low pass, audio blending
  • Appropriate use of audio file formats and compression
  • Advanced utilisation of audio middleware (Unity)
  • Dynamic soundscape
  • Dynamic music
  • Realistic acoustic space (spatialisation)
  • A sprightly scene tying together and demonstrating all of the above
